title: 你们说哪些mod好？
author: cao_ni_ma
txt_content: 如题，lz在做一个整合包，你们说那些基础mod必备捏？

replies.author: 幽蓝
replies.txt_content: 中文输入/CJB/生物雷达/矿物追踪/更多动作

replies.author: 连杰振
replies.txt_content: 小地图、TMI、血量显示必须滴~

replies.author: DXYE_REX
replies.txt_content: 看你那个整合是玩什么的

replies.author: diannaodi
